heading: market watch
subheading: us stocks were mixed in early monday trading, as gains by computer-related stocks, particularly intel, were offset by losses elsewhere. the wired index jumped 9.97 to 638.59, the dow jones industrial average fell 26.26 to 9617.06, and the nasdaq rose 27.05 to 2371.46.
author: wired staff
text: us stocks were mixed in early monday trading, as gains by computer-related stocks, particularly intel, were offset by losses elsewhere. the  wired index jumped 9.97 to 638.59, the dow jones industrial average fell 26.26 to 9617.06, and the nasdaq rose 27.05 to 2371.46.
